text: 1:14 2 Korin 9:7; 1 Pita 5:2Kɨ kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, nɨ bizir kam gifueghan koghtɨma, kɨ bizir kam damuan kogham. Kamaghɨn ami, Onesimus na ko ikiasa, kɨ nɨ mɨgeir puvatɨ. Bizir tizim nɨ a damuasa, kɨ mɨghɨghvɨra nɨ gakaghonan aghua. Kɨ kamaghɨn nɨghnɨsi, nɨ arazir aghuim nan akurvaghsɨ nɨ damu, kamaghɨn nɨ uan ifongiamɨn gɨn mangɨva a damu.
